product.title: Daytona Rose Blush - Plantation Shutter
product.description: In palest pink, the daytona range's rose blush is fresh and welcoming, and this barely-there pink is ideal for adding colour without overwhelming a room. As a bonus, the high quality faux wood of the shutter is moisture-resistant, so whether you hang it in the bedroom or the bathroom, you get long-lasting durability. Use the rose blush in the nursery for a serene and relaxing ambience that you'll want to spend all day in.

relproducts.title: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Valencia Orchid Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: If hot pink is too bright and baby pink too delicate, this valencia orchid pink roller blind is the perfect solution for you. The fabric is positively blushing, helping you to add a gentle and relaxing flash of colour to your home whilst filling your room with a feminine charm.

relproducts.title: Rimini Rose - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pretty vintage of the rimini rose provides a strikingly elegant look, its dusky pink hue giving any room a warm, rosy glow. The long-lasting, resilient fabric has a smooth, effortless finish, allowing light to gently penetrate through. This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This stunning rosewood pink stockholm roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Lipstick Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholm fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft rosewood pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Hot Pink
relproducts.description: Stirlohot pink plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Rimini (Blackout) Primrose - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini (blackout) in primrose combines a best-in-class light-controlling blackout fabric with a rich, vivid yellow colouring; perfect for bringing the feel of sunshine in even when you need to block it out. This primrose colouring will brighten up any room. Consider the rimini in primrose as an addition to a white or pastel coloured landing or hallway, to add a splash of colour without the need to totally redecorate.

relproducts.title: Prime Hint
relproducts.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 2438mm min drop: 250mm max drop: 2438mm fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched. Fabric composition: polyester tube: robust aluminium tube control: sidewinder control only guarantee: 12 months fittings: included buy made to measure prime hint budget roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality budget roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery.

relproducts.title: Galaxy Plantation Green Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The warm tones of the galaxy plantation roman blind are sure to enrich your space. Making the most of a plain design, the curtain features a defined woven finish that gives an attractive textural effect. The fabric is woven with silvery metallic yarn alongside earthy tones of green to create a surprise touch of sparkle. Product id: db-rom1025 fabric colour: plantation green material: 60% polyester 40% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Galaxy Plantation Green Curtain
relproducts.description: Complement your design scheme with the warm earthy tones of the galaxy plantation green curtain. Drawing strength from a simple design, the curtain features a defined woven texture for an appealing rustic style. The finished effect has hidden depths in the form of a subtle sparkle from metallic yarn incorporated into the green weave. Product id: db-cur1147 fabric colour: plantation green material: 60% polyester 40% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes galaxy plantation green curtain in green.

relproducts.title: Daytona Vivid White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: White doesn't get much whiter or brighter than the daytona in vivid white. This icy white hue covers the durable faux wood of the shutter flawlessly, and works wonderfully as any of their different style options: tier on tier, caf, or full height. Pair the vivid white with any colour scheme you like, but for a truly striking style, stick to an all-white theme in an open-plan kitchen. Think white walls, white units, white floor, white everything - the look will be bold and vivacious, and certainly hard to forget.

relproducts.title: Daytona Horizon Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Soft and subtle, the daytona in horizon grey is a pretty shade of grey that works as an attractive neutral for stronger tones. The durable, high quality faux wood the shutter is made from is energy efficient, water-resistant, and not prone to warping or cracking. Choose from three distinct shutter types. Match the horizon grey to a rich red feature wall for a look that really stands out. This cosy colour scheme is perfect for a living room.

relproducts.title: Daytona Antique White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home. Choose from three different styles. Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Daytona Dignity Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: An attractive mid-grey, the dignity grey, from the daytona range, can be the star of the show or the colour-popping neutral. Choose from versatile tier on tier, traditional full height, or boutique caf styles. Team the dignity grey with a dark grass green for an unusual and quirky colour scheme that brings the outside in. Try this for a striking look in the dining room or den. Include the occasional pale grey to lighten the look and add some extra depth to the theme.

relproducts.title: Daytona Cool White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: Available in three distinct yet equally lovely styles, the daytona cool white is neutral, calming, and stylish. Go for the caf for a boutique look, full height for a classic shutter, or tier on tier for something with a difference and plenty of flexibility. Set the cool white against equally cool pastel shades, such as mint green or baby blue. Accessorise throughout with matching pastel hues, as well as plenty of white.

relproducts.title: Daytona Soho - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: In attractive grey-toned cream, the daytona soho is the perfect neutral. It will work with a number of colour schemes and is available in three distinct styles of shutter. The water-resistant faux wood is guaranteed not to crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the soho into a bedroom, living room, or master bedroom full of coordinating shades of grey, including charcoal greys, dove greys, and oatmeal greys.

relproducts.title: Daytona Linen - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The pretty cream tone of the daytona in linen is soft and cosy, and covers the shutters flawlessly. Durable, water-resistant faux wood means no cracking and no warping, making them perfect for any room in the home, even bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the linen amidst warm chocolate browns and subtle lattes for a relaxing and luxurious look in the master bedroom or living room. Keep the room feeling light and airy with plenty of matching creams and lots of light.

relproducts.title: Daytona Shark Grey - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: In prettiest pale grey, the daytona in shark grey is sweet and subtle. The durable, high quality faux wood that it's made from is water-resistant, so won't warp or crack in any room in the home. Choose from three shutter styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Team the shark grey with a pure red tone for a strong and stylish colour scheme, perfect for a contemporary home. Keep the red to a minimum to avoid overpowering the room and include plenty of white and grey tones.

relproducts.title: Full Height Hampton Moonlit Grey Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Indulge in the serene and subtle elegance of the full height hampton moonlit grey shutter. The pale grey hue offers a touch of tonal detail to your space that works beautifully with bold, dark tones and delicate pastels too. Created from practical upvc, this smart and durable faux wood shutter is an enduring option for revamping your windows. Product id: db-shu0033 fabric colour: moonlit grey material: upvc control type: optional centre tilt rod energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention blackout: yes full height hampton moonlit grey faux wood shutter in grey.

relproducts.title: Full Height Hampton Phantom Grey Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: The hampton shutters can transform your space and add a timeless touch of sophistication to your decor. Combining functionality with fashion-forward style in a delicate grey hue, this gorgeous shutter is a stunning choice for your windows. Made from sturdy upvc, the full height hampton phantom grey faux wood shutter is designed to look good for longer, even in bathrooms and kitchens. Product id: db-shu0034 fabric colour: phantom grey material: upvc control type: optional centre tilt rod energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention blackout: yes full height hampton phantom grey faux wood shutter in grey.

relproducts.title: Full Height Hampton Lunar Grey Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Embrace the classic appearance of shutters in any cool, modern scheme with the hampton shutter finished in soft grey. The full height hampton lunar grey faux wood shutter is created from upvc for a pristine appearance that is easy to maintain. The lunar grey colourway provides a light and versatile accent for decorating your space. relproducts.title: Full Height Hampton Ecru Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Opt for a window dressing that enhances your home all year round, with these classic full height shutters in a charming ecru finish. With these shutters you can bathe your home in warm light, or shut out the wintry weather. A fantastic feature of the hampton range is the waterproof pvc construction, so kitchens and bathrooms can benefit too. relproducts.title: Full Height Hampton Armoury Grey Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Their gorgeous hampton shutters offer an on-trend option for restyling your space. This versatile shade of grey gives this character shutter a cool yet bold finish that will coordinate well with a wide range of accent colours. The full height hampton armour grey faux wood shutter is produced from upvc to provide a lasting solution for bathrooms and kitchens, as well as beautifying bedrooms and living spaces.

relproducts.title: Caf Style Hampton Silk White Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Bask in the benefits of fitted window shutters with this bright and breezy, caf style option in silk white. The half height gives you all privacy you need, whilst you can enjoy a sense of space and loads of light. The hampton range provides resilient pvc shutters that are ideal for updating bathrooms and kitchens with a lasting fresh finish. relproducts.title: Caf Style Hampton Phantom Grey Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: The caf style hampton phantom grey faux wood shutter is a timeless update for any interior. The classic form of this gorgeous faux wood shutter is beautifully accentuated by the delicate grey finish, and will look the part in both traditional and contemporary inspired spaces. You can enjoy this simply luxurious look within a bathroom or kitchen too, thanks to its moisture resistant upvc construction.

relproducts.title: Caf Style Hampton Vivid White Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Brighten up your living space with these hampton shutters. Thanks to a vivid white finish and caf style height, you can make the most of any natural light. The hampton range is characterised by its waterproof pvc construction, which will maintain its good looks in humid conditions, so even kitchens and bathrooms can benefit from a brilliant update. relproducts.title: Full Height Hampton Silk White Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Window shutters from the hampton range offer a unique addition to your dcor, boasting versatility whatever the weather, and unwavering style that is sure to impress. Made from durable pvc, these shutters provide a waterproof option for bathrooms and kitchens. The classic, full height design is made even more timeless with a subtle colouring in silk white. relproducts.title: Caf Style Hampton Moonlit Grey Faux Wood Shutter
relproducts.description: Make the most of natural light in your home whilst beautifully accenting your interior with this fashionable shutter design. The caf style hampton moonlit grey faux wood shutter is finished in a soft muted grey shade for a modern mood that is so versatile. This bright and stylish shutter is produced from moisture resistant upvc material so you can enjoy the look in bathrooms and kitchens too. relproducts.title: Daytona Pure White - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The daytona in pure white offers a classic white tone that will work in any surrounding. Made from high quality, durable faux wood, the shutter is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three key styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Paint the wall surrounding the pure white in a bold, cheery colour that will allow the shutter to stand out and create a focal point in the room. Think apple green in the kitchen, sky blue in the home office, or lemon yellow in the guest bedroom.

relproducts.title: Daytona Maya Blue - Plantation Shutter
relproducts.description: The serene sky blue of the daytona maya blue is pretty as a picture. The colour is the perfect shade for the smooth, durable faux wood that the shutter is made from. Choose from caf, full height, or tier on tier for the style that best suits your home. Soft whites and luxe creams will go beautifully with the lovely maya blue. Opt for a shabby chic or vintage look in a living room or bedroom to really make the most of this attractive shutter.
